name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
description: Stakes {{token}} on [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) to mint stETH which accumulates ETH 2.0 staking rewards. This strategy will buy stETH off the market if it is cheaper than staking.

en.name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
en.description: Stakes {{token}} on [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) to mint stETH which accumulates ETH 2.0 staking rewards. This strategy will buy stETH off the market if it is cheaper than staking.

fr.name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
fr.description: Hace staking de {{token}} en [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) para acuñar stETH que acumula recompensas de staking de ETH 2.0. Esta estrategia comprará stETH del mercado si es más barato que hacer staking.
